array.string: How did you feel about the amount of therapy (number and duration of sessions) you received this week?
Overall, how were you feeling this week?
Follow up if overall wellness was worsened: Do you know why?
In comparison to when you began this session, how much energy do you have, or how tired do you feel, following a session’s completion?
Which of the following best describes your overall mood following a session’s completion compared to when you begin a session?
Follow up if overall mood worsened: Do you know why?
How much did you like using the system this week?

Overall, how easy or difficult was it to understand how to use the system? For example, following directions on how to setup targets and complete the task, not necessarily how challenging the task itself felt.
Follow up if any difficulty was indicated: Which part(s) did you find difficult?
Overall, how challenging was it to perform the training tasks you were asked to complete?
Follow up if too much challenge was indicated: Which part(s) did you find too challenging?
How easy or difficult was it to understand your performance using the visual feedback that you saw?
Follow up if any difficulty was indicated: Which part(s) did you find difficult to understand?
How easy or difficult was it to understand your performance using the sound feedback that you heard?
Follow up if any difficulty was indicated: Which part(s) did you find difficult to understand?
How much did you like the visual feedback that you saw?
Follow up if dislike was indicated: Which part(s) did you dislike most?
How much did you like the sound feedback that you heard?
Follow up if dislike was indicated: Which part(s) did you dislike most?
How much did you use your affected arm in daily activity outside of training this week?
Overall, how do you think you’ve been doing in this week’s training?
